text: Dr. Barbara Engelking (born April 22, 1962) is a Polish psychologist and sociologist specializing in Holocaust studies. Dr. Engelking is the founder and director of the Polish Center for Holocaust Research in Warsaw, who has written a series of books about the Holocaust in Poland. ==Education== She received an MA in psychology from the University of Warsaw in 1988 and a Ph.D. in sociology from the Polish Academy of Sciences. ==Career== Since 1993, Dr. Engelking has been an assistant then associate professor at the Polish Center for Holocaust Research, part of the Institute of Philosophy and Sociology at the Polish Academy of Sciences. Since 2014, she has been chair of Poland's . * * * Between November 2015 and April 2016, Dr. Engelking was the Ina Levine Invitational Scholar at the United States Holocaust Memorial Museum (USHMM) Mandel Center in Washington, D.C. ==Incidents== In February 2021, Profs.
